title: Please bring badger teemo.
body: When I first got teemo I love his badger skin and wanted it so badly but when I got first rp card, riot got rid of it so now it gets on my nerves when see other term users have the skin. So please Riot for all that is yordle, bring back badger teemo.{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
Riot re-releases that skin several times a year when the "legacy vault is open"
Just keep some RP on hand, it'll become available again for a limited time, you just have to wait for your opportunity :)
Yeah, everything you guys/gals have said are true. So thank you for the ideas.
or hope for a mystery gift
